'''Lord Stokeworth''' is the head of [[House Stokeworth]], a vassal house of [[House Baratheon of King's Landing]].
sections.In the books:
In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, nothing is known about Lord Stokeworth other than that he is the husband of Lady Tanda and the father of Falyse and Lollys.

Lollys's father is actually dead at the time of the novels, and the current head of House Stokeworth is his widow Lady Tanda. It is unknown why the TV series made this change.
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 4]]===

[[Cersei Lannister]] arranges for a marriage between [[Lollys Stokeworth]] and Ser [[Bronn]] of the Blackwater to sway the ambitious ex-sellsword away from [[Tyrion Lannister]]'s service. Tyrion tells Bronn that he should have married her older sister [[Falyse Stokeworth|Falyse]], who will inherit [[Castle Stokeworth]] when her father dies, but he replies that she is barren.<ref>"[[Mockingbird]]"</ref>
